item.title: Why the world is training on the book of Britain's most brutal prisoner
item.description: Charles Bronson (Photo: Joel Goodman/Global Look Press) Why the world is training on the book of Britain’s most brutal prisoner In the past 15 years, the fitness program of Briton Charles Bronson, who is serving a life sentence, has gained popularity. What is remarkable about the personality of the author, based on whose biography a film with Tom Hardy was made, and why the book written in prison has become a cult
